title: The Entente Cordiale
content:
Do you know the name of these fonts or something that similar, thank you very much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Entente cordiale.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124734/http:/typophile.com/files/Entente%20cordiale.gif) | 71.95 KB |
author: manukball

comments.content: [The Komika Series](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124734/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=komika&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=ENTENTE+CORDIALE&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha) from Apostrophic Labs or [The Signpainter Kit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124734/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit/viewfonts) from House Ind.

This is a flyer for the Brighton studio [<cite> the Entente </cite>](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124734/http:/www.the-entente.org/work.php?id=3). Edd sometimes visits this site. I'll drop him a line to ask.

Looks very much like House Slant from House Industries as Renko suggests.

Thanks for the heads up Ben :)  
Its actually [Komika - Paint from Apostrophic Labs.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124734/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Komika-Title)

Hope this helps!
